mapper.sql:
FROM cart a left join member b on a.memberSeq = b.memberSeq left join product c on a.productSeq = c.productSeq WHERE 1=1 AND a.memberSeq = #{memberSeq} AND DelNy = #{shDelNy}
AND cartSeq LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND nm LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND product_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%')
mapper.select: SELECT a.cartSeq ,a.memberSeq ,a.productSeq ,a.DelNy ,b.id ,b.nm ,c.product_name ,c.price ,c.discount_percent FROM cart a left join member b on a.memberSeq = b.memberSeq left join product c on a.productSeq = c.productSeq WHERE 1=1 AND a.memberSeq = #{memberSeq}
